rules.title: You must register and have an account on cs2hvh.com
rules.desc: Registration and account creation on cs2hvh.com are mandatory.

rules.title: Who can play?
rules.desc: Participation is open to individuals worldwide, without any regional restrictions.

rules.title: Server Locations
rules.desc: Players need to select their preferred server location, and matches will be organized accordingly. (Ensure you select the region with the lowest latency/ping from the provided data centers.)

rules.title: Match format
rules.desc: All matches will be in a Best of 1 format. All matches have overtime enabled. Except for semifinals and finals, all matches will follow a single-elimination format, while the semifinals and finals will be conducted as best of three.

rules.title: Players Settings
rules.desc: Players are required to report 30 minutes prior to their match. There will be no waiting for any team/player. Matches can only be rescheduled if the other 2 teams are ready to face off.

rules.title: Match Timings
rules.desc: All matches will be conducted on weekends, that is, Saturdays/Sundays.

rules.title: Exploits
rules.desc: Utilizing any exploit that causes lag or disrupts the normal functioning of the server will lead to disqualification.
